name: testcoin
description: Real world asset that give btc and membership to the staker of the coin

asset.name: Test
asset.description: A state-of-the-art cultural and creative hub featuring theaters, art galleries, performance halls, and exhibition spaces. Hosts year-round art festivals, concerts, film screenings, and cultural programs that attract both locals and tourists. The center integrates blockchain-based digital ticketing and NFT membership passes for exclusive experiences.
asset.staking: Stakers share in ticketing revenues, event sponsorship deals, and merchandise sales. They also gain exclusive perks such as early access to premium events, discounted entry, and access to NFT-gated VIP lounges.
